Values.OktaClientId: <'Independent Provider Licensing Service API' Application Client Id>
Values.OktaPrivateKey: <Okta JWT private key>.  Only needed for local development
Values.OktaLicensingGroupId: <'Independent Provider Licensing Service Users' Group Id>
Values.OktaApplicationGroupId: <'Independent Provider Application Service Users' Group Id>
Values.M365LocalDevTenantId: <Microsoft 365 tenant Id e.g. acme.onmicrosoft.com> for local development
Values.M365LocalDevClientId: <Client Id of app registration for local development>
Values.M365RootSiteUrl: <sharepoint tenant root site url e.g. https://contoso.sharepoint.com
Values.M365InviteRedirectUrl: <Url users are sent to when clicking link in invite>
Values.M365SiteOwner: <Primary site owner>.  This is the user that will become the owner of all created Licence sites
Values.M365SiteAdminsEntraIDGroup: <SharePoint Admins Group>  This group will be added to the Site Collection administrators group of all created Licence sites
Values.M365IndependentProviderTeamEntraIDGroup: <IP Licensing Team Group>  This group will be granted permission to all Licence sites
Values.M365SitePrefix: <Licence Site URL prefix>  All created Licence sites will have this prefix in the URL>
